poem:
### Raising the Roof

In the shadow of discontent,
Yimby voices rise, a chorus
Against the ancient walls.
Yes, to dreams built high and
Sheltering, where once only
Fear of change stood.
Truth hammered into beams
Of light, where lives twist
Towards a future,
Unafraid of new horizons.
